I need to make a rejection means I now get to make a counter-offer. I should consider a fair division while accounting for our different inflation rates.

A 50-50 split might seem fair initially, but given our asymmetric inflation rates, I should offer Alice slightly more to incentivize her to accept now rather than waiting.
